reviews.text: The rooms are clean and the pool is nice. They serve snacks and beer every night in the lobby and the continental breakfast is above average. Oxford is a pretty miserable place, but the location of the Wingate is great. There is a large variety of restaurants within walking distance and a decent shopping center on the other side of I-20.
reviews.title: Nice Place in Oxford

reviews.text: My daughter and I attended a concert in Birmingham and stayed at this Wingate. It is about an hour's drive from Birmingham and right off I-20. We got a weekend rate of $66, which is outstanding for this class of motel. I can't think of a thing that was wrong. Staff was friendly, room spotless, breakfast delicious: homemade waffles, yogurt, eggs, etc. Huge room. Will definitely go back.
reviews.title: Great Weekend Getaway
Found a new favorite place to stay
reviews.text: We have found a new favorite motel-chain. Our first impression was at check-in. Staff was VERY personable and helpful. They even apoligized for the noise from the lawn being mowed and told us they would be finished in 5 minutes!!!!!The rooms are very well designed and comfortable with all the amenities of home (frige, microwave, coffee pot etc)and very clean.We are planning a trip out west in the fall and will stay at as many Wingate Inns as we can find.
